verses.verse: כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD שִׁמְר֥וּ <S%H8104><s%> Keep מִשְׁפָּ֖ט <S%H4941><s%> ye judgment וַעֲשׂ֣וּ <S%H6213><s%> and do צְדָקָ֑ה <S%H6666><s%> justice כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for קְרוֹבָ֤ה <S%H7138><s%> [is] near יְשֽׁוּעָתִי֙ <S%H3444><s%> for my salvation לָב֔וֹא <S%H935><s%> to come וְצִדְקָתִ֖י <S%H6666><s%> and my righteousness לְהִגָּלֽוֹת׃ <S%H1540><s%> to be revealed

אַשְׁרֵ֤י <S%H835><s%> Blessed אֱנוֹשׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> who יַעֲשֶׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> [that] doeth זֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> likewise וּבֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> this and the son אָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> of man יַחֲזִ֣יק <S%H2388><s%> [that] layeth hold בָּ֑הּ שֹׁמֵ֤ר <S%H8104><s%> on it that keepeth שַׁבָּת֙ <S%H7676><s%> the sabbath מֵֽחַלְּל֔וֹ <S%H2490><s%> from polluting וְשֹׁמֵ֥ר <S%H8104><s%> it and keepeth יָד֖וֹ <S%H3027><s%> his hand מֵעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> from doing כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any רָֽע׃ <S%H7451><s%> any evil ס

וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> Nor יֹאמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> speak בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> Neither let the son הַנֵּכָ֗ר <S%H5236><s%> of the stranger הַנִּלְוָ֤ה <S%H3867><s%> that hath joined אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> himself to the LORD לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying הַבְדֵּ֧ל <S%H914><s%> hath utterly יַבְדִּילַ֛נִי <S%H914><s%> separated יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> from עַמּ֑וֹ <S%H5971><s%> me from his people וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> Nor יֹאמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> say הַסָּרִ֔יס <S%H5631><s%> neither let the eunuch הֵ֥ן <S%H2005><s%> Behold אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I עֵ֥ץ <S%H6086><s%> tree יָבֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H3002><s%> Behold I [am] a dry ס

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> For כֹ֣ה ׀ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> For thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לַסָּֽרִיסִים֙ <S%H5631><s%> unto the eunuchs אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> who יִשְׁמְרוּ֙ <S%H8104><s%> that keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שַׁבְּתוֹתַ֔י <S%H7676><s%> my sabbaths וּבָֽחֲר֖וּ <S%H977><s%> and choose בַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> what חָפָ֑צְתִּי <S%H2654><s%> [the things] that please וּמַחֲזִיקִ֖ים <S%H2388><s%> me and take hold בִּבְרִיתִֽי׃ <S%H1285><s%> of my covenant

וְנָתַתִּ֨י <S%H5414><s%> Even unto them will I give לָהֶ֜ם בְּבֵיתִ֤י <S%H1004><s%> in mine house וּבְחֽוֹמֹתַי֙ <S%H2346><s%> and within my walls יָ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> a place וָשֵׁ֔ם <S%H8034><s%> and a name ט֖וֹב <S%H2896><s%> better מִבָּנִ֣ים <S%H1121><s%> than of sons וּמִבָּנ֑וֹת <S%H1323><s%> and of daughters שֵׁ֤ם <S%H8034><s%> name עוֹלָם֙ <S%H5769><s%> them an everlasting אֶתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> I will give ל֔וֹ אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יִכָּרֵֽת׃ <S%H3772><s%> that shall not be cut off ס

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> Also the sons הַנֵּכָ֗ר <S%H5236><s%> of the stranger הַנִּלְוִ֤ים <S%H3867><s%> that join עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> themselves to the LORD לְשָׁ֣רְת֔וֹ <S%H8334><s%> to serve וּֽלְאַהֲבָה֙ <S%H157><s%> him and to love אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> the name יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לִהְי֥וֹת <S%H1961><s%> become ל֖וֹ לַעֲבָדִ֑ים <S%H5650><s%> to be his servants כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every שֹׁמֵ֤ר <S%H8104><s%> every one that keepeth שַׁבָּת֙ <S%H7676><s%> the sabbath מֵֽחַלְּל֔וֹ <S%H2490><s%> from polluting וּמַחֲזִיקִ֖ים <S%H2388><s%> it and taketh hold בִּבְרִיתִֽי׃ <S%H1285><s%> of my covenant

וַהֲבִיאוֹתִ֞ים <S%H935><s%> Even them will I bring אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> mountain קָדְשִׁ֗י <S%H6944><s%> to my holy וְשִׂמַּחְתִּים֙ <S%H8055><s%> and make them joyful בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> in my house תְּפִלָּתִ֔י <S%H8605><s%> of prayer עוֹלֹתֵיהֶ֧ם <S%H5930><s%> their burnt offerings וְזִבְחֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H2077><s%> and their sacrifices לְרָצ֖וֹן <S%H7522><s%> [shall be] accepted עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> on מִזְבְּחִ֑י <S%H4196><s%> upon mine altar כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For בֵיתִ֔י <S%H1004><s%> for mine house בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> an house תְּפִלָּ֥ה <S%H8605><s%> of prayer יִקָּרֵ֖א <S%H7121><s%> shall be called לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all הָעַמִּֽים׃ <S%H5971><s%> for all people

נְאֻם֙ <S%H5002><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> The Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD מְקַבֵּ֖ץ <S%H6908><s%> which gathereth נִדְחֵ֣י <S%H1760><s%> the outcasts יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel ע֛וֹד <S%H5750><s%> Yet אֲקַבֵּ֥ץ <S%H6908><s%> Yet will I gather עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> unto לְנִקְבָּצָֽיו׃ <S%H6908><s%> [others] to him beside those that are gathered

כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> All חַיְת֣וֹ <S%H2416><s%> All ye beasts שָׂדָ֑י <S%H7704><s%> of the field אֵתָ֕יוּ <S%H857><s%> come לֶאֱכֹ֥ל <S%H398><s%> to devour כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All חַיְת֖וֹ <S%H2416><s%> [yea] all ye beasts בַּיָּֽעַר׃ <S%H3293><s%> in the forest ס

[צָפוּ כ] (צֹפָ֞יו <S%H6822><s%> behold ק) עִוְרִ֤ים <S%H5787><s%> [are] blind כֻּלָּם֙ <S%H3605><s%> All לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nothing יָדָ֔עוּ <S%H3045><s%> they are all ignorant כֻּלָּם֙ <S%H3605><s%> All כְּלָבִ֣ים <S%H3611><s%> dogs אִלְּמִ֔ים <S%H483><s%> they [are] all dumb לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nothing יוּכְל֖וּ <S%H3201><s%> they cannot לִנְבֹּ֑חַ <S%H5024><s%> bark הֹזִים֙ <S%H1957><s%> sleeping שֹֽׁכְבִ֔ים <S%H7901><s%> lying down אֹהֲבֵ֖י <S%H157><s%> loving לָנֽוּם׃ <S%H5123><s%> to slumber

וְהַכְּלָבִ֣ים <S%H3611><s%> dogs עַזֵּי־ <S%H5794><s%> fierce נֶ֗פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> any לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> no יָֽדְעוּ֙ <S%H3045><s%> [which] can שָׂבְעָ֔ה <S%H7646><s%> have enough וְהֵ֣מָּה <S%H1992><s%> and they רֹעִ֔ים <S%H7462><s%> and they [are] shepherds לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no יָדְע֖וּ <S%H3045><s%> never have הָבִ֑ין <S%H995><s%> [that] cannot understand כֻּלָּם֙ <S%H3605><s%> have all לְדַרְכָּ֣ם <S%H1870><s%> to their own way פָּנ֔וּ <S%H6437><s%> they all look אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one לְבִצְע֖וֹ <S%H1215><s%> for his gain מִקָּצֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H7097><s%> from his quarter

אֵתָ֥יוּ <S%H857><s%> Come אֶקְחָה־ <S%H3947><s%> ye [say they] I will fetch יַ֖יִן <S%H3196><s%> wine וְנִסְבְּאָ֣ה <S%H5433><s%> and we will fill שֵׁכָ֑ר <S%H7941><s%> ourselves with strong drink וְהָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become כָזֶה֙ <S%H2088><s%> this י֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> shall be as this day מָחָ֔ר <S%H4279><s%> and to morrow גָּד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> abundant יֶ֥תֶר <S%H3499><s%> more מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> [and] much
